Register Now        Request Information        Events                                                                     Noncredit Courses        Noncredit courses in publishing span the breadth and depth of the industry, from understanding the fundamentals of editing, copywriting, marketing, and digital rights to mastering the latest Web tools and platforms that publishing professionals use. Three industry-focused certificate programs in Book Publishing , Editing , and Magazine and Website Publishing also are available.           Ready to Proceed?
